title: THE POOR IMAGE, THE MALE GAZE, THE ORGAN-WITHOUT-BODY: READING MIRANDA’S UNDERW[H]E(A)RE | Patreon

highlights.highlight: Luca Miranda’s Underw[h]e(a)re is a critical intervention into the polished, seemingly immersive environment of Assassin’s Creed: Unity (2014), disrupting its visual coherence by redirecting the camera toward the game’s underclass of background characters denied narrative agency.
p5.js is a friendly tool for learning to code and make art.

title: Cyberpunk 2077: A Gorgeous Exaggeration of an Existential Crisis
